current_task.description: Implemented LoggingPlugin improvements based on OverseerAI review suggestions
changes: Replaced 5 silent error handling (try?) with proper do-catch blocks
Added defer block for proper file handle cleanup
All errors now logged with GitBrainLogger.warning()

content.message: LoggingPlugin improvements completed. Replaced print() with GitBrainLogger, added proper error handling, fixed deprecated API. Build successful and all 26 tests passing.
